reviews.review: Jogo muito bom. O Anti Cheat apresenta problemas constantes, como se eu tivesse mudado algo no jogo. Muito chato ter que desinstalar a pasta e instalar novamente pra poder jogar. Mas o jogo em si é excelente!
J'y ai joué 1300 heures sur ps4 et lors de l'achat de mon PC , J'ai pas hésité car ce jeux en vaux la peine . Je recommande amplement malgrer les fameux bugs enrichissants ahah ;)

fun

Super recomendo, divertido solo e mais ainda com os amigos. Legal do jeito que ta, mas dava pra melhorar e arrumar varias coisas. A base do jogo é divertida e fácil, mas tem MUITA coisa pra aprender, o Skill Ceiling é alto, pra quem quer ser mestre no game. Muito potencial para competitivo se tiverem mudanças com esse foco, mas duvido que aconteça.
Coisas que aprendi:
Evite ser tóxico.
Killer só se ferra.
Do 10 pra cima, Rank não quer dizer nada. Uma vez ou outra você vai encontrar gente forte nesse jogo, mas não julgue pelo Rank.
Procure melhorar o seu gameplay, ao invés de focar em pegar Kills ou Fugir sozinho. Isso evita se frustrar e a quitar do game.

the game has a HUGE time investment to get into, at the time of review I have 11 and a half hours and havent managed to get my first teachable perk yet (might be partly cos I'm bad but hey :P) but the game is tense and fun, you just have to put the time and effort in to get going. the learning curve is daunting but I think it's worth it

At the time that I am writing this, I have 429 hours on this game. I am absolutely ADDICTED. I am not even that good, I am in purple ranks. The only thing I know is teabagging and bodyblocking (maybe that is why I am still in purple ranks) The only other thing I also know is that my teammates' nationalities originate from trashbags and tiny baby feces. I will die on third hook and I will get camped, constantly. If I had a wife she would have left me already for the piece of flashlight-clicking doormat I am, but maybe that is why I don't have a wife, since I also play legion.

Good game would buy again.

One of my favorite games right now. Easy to learn, but super hard to master. A bunch of perks to use and switch for plenty of replayability and different results. All for just 20 dollars initially, this is very worth your time and money. 10/10 game.
